definition: Zheng He (1371-1433), famous early Ming dynasty admiral and explorer
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs

sentences.english: Preliminary Performance Comparison between the Replica Model of Zheng-He's Treasure …
sentences.chinese: 鄭和寶船復原模型與典型福船及沙船性能之初步比較。

sentences.english: Records of Zheng He's incredible voyages were burned.
sentences.chinese: 鄭和令人驚歎的航海紀錄也遭焚燬湮滅。

sentences.english: Outside wall of the Zhenghe Memorial Tablet Collection, Zhenghe Park, Kunyang.
sentences.chinese: 昆陽鄭和公園鄭和紀念碑林牆外。

sentences.english: Outside wall of the Zhenghe Memorial Tablet Collection, Zhenghe Park, Kunyang.
sentences.chinese: 昆陽鄭和公園鄭和紀念碑林牆外。

sentences.english: Zheng He: messenger of peace, or of power?
sentences.chinese: 鄭和:和平的使者，還是權力的傳送者？

sentences.english: Records about his external appearance were credible.
sentences.chinese: 諸書有關鄭和體貌的記載是可信的。

sentences.english: Zhenghe and his men made seven crossings on the Indian Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 鄭和和他的手下人七次橫渡印度洋。

sentences.english: Zheng He was a mous Chinese explorer.
sentences.chinese: 鄭和是一位著名的中國探險家。

sentences.english: The thesis proves Zheng as the descendant of Sayyid from five aspects.
sentences.chinese: 本文從五個方面論證了鄭和是賽典赤的後裔。

sentences.english: Zheng He's seven expeditions was the great feat in Ming Dynasty, its influence is wide and deep.
sentences.chinese: 鄭和七航，乃明季盛事，其影響既廣且深。

sentences.english: Chinese navy vessel sails for ROK, Japan.
sentences.chinese: 中國海軍“鄭和”號啓程訪問韓國日本。

sentences.english: The ships set sail under the command of Zhenghe.
sentences.chinese: 船隊在鄭和的指揮下航行。

sentences.english: The sound of peace and the Chinese people's respects are what Zheng He delivered when crossing the oceans.
sentences.chinese: 鄭和遠渡重洋送去的是中華民族的問候和和平之音。

sentences.english: Zheng He was a native of Kunyang, Jinning County in Yunnan.
sentences.chinese: 鄭和是雲南晉寧縣昆陽人。

sentences.english: On October 10, 1405, the fleet rides the Yangtze current into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 年10月，鄭和的船隊乘着長江駛向大海。

sentences.english: The Zheng He's fleet he sailed the world but didn't rob other countries.
sentences.chinese: 鄭和船隊遠渡重洋，卻沒有任何掠奪它國的行爲。

definition: to look at sth through a bamboo tube/to have a restricted view
Matteo Ricci (1552-1610), Jesuit missionary and translator in Ming China
old term for Sulawesi or Celebes 苏拉威西
to acclaim/to sing the praises of
